body:
the same binary works for CPU-only machines as well.

If you see in `/home/XXX/anaconda3/lib/`, you will see `libcudart.so.8.0`, because invoking `conda install pytorch torchvision -c pytorch` should've installed `cudatoolkit` package in anaconda.
